name: Purple Chicken (2d Platformer)
description:
Attention: This game, Purple Chicken: 2D Pixel Platformer, was originally released on mobile in 2020 but had to be removed due to technical issues. It is now being republished for promotional purposes and to provide financial support for the development of my new game, Rooster Tale: 2D Platformer. If you would like to support my work and show your interest in Rooster Tale, please consider adding it to your wishlist on Steam at the following link: Rooster Tale (2d Platformer). I appreciate your support and hope you enjoy playing Purple Chicken: 2D Pixel Platformer. Thank you!

Get ready for the ultimate platforming challenge with Purple Chicken: 2D Pixel Platformer! In this retro-inspired game, you'll take control of a brave purple chicken on a mission to navigate through 36 levels filled with danger and obstacles. From sharp spikes and falling crates to deadly beasts, you'll need to use all of your agility and quick thinking to avoid danger and reach the portal to the next stage.

As you progress through the game, the difficulty will increase, testing your skills and reflexes to the limit. But with responsive controls and smooth gameplay, you'll feel like a true pixel platforming pro as you jump, run, and avoid obstacles with precision.

So if you think you have what it takes to become the ultimate Purple Chicken master, don't wait any longer - start playing now!  So let's get started, and see if you have what it takes to conquer Purple Chicken: 2D Pixel Platformer!
